recordTypes.name: Community Well Construction Permit Application
recordTypes.description: Select this permit for drilling activities associated with the construction of a Public Water System well. Construction of a new well can only be performed by a C-57 licensed driller. The California Contractors State License Board can be searched for that type of licensed driller at: https://www.cslb.ca.gov/OnlineServices/CheckLicenseII/CheckLicense.aspx

recordTypes.name: Domestic Well Construction Permit Application
recordTypes.description: Select this permit for drilling activities associated with the construction of a domestic water well. Construction of a new well can only be performed by a C-57 licensed driller. The California Contractors State License Board can be searched for that type of licensed driller at: https://www.cslb.ca.gov/OnlineServices/CheckLicenseII/CheckLicense.aspx

recordTypes.name: Existing System Leach Line Repair, Replace or Modify
recordTypes.description: This application is for replacement septic systems or repairs to existing systems leach field.

recordTypes.name: Monitoring Well Construction Permit Application
recordTypes.description: Select this permit for drilling activities associated with the construction of a monitoring well. Construction of a new well can only be performed by a C-57 licensed driller. The California Contractors State License Board can be searched for that type of licensed driller at: https://www.cslb.ca.gov/OnlineServices/CheckLicenseII/CheckLicense.aspx

recordTypes.name: New Alternative Design Septic System Permit
recordTypes.description: This application is for a new alternative septic system installation. DO NOT DO A PERC TEST UNTIL YOUR SITE HAS BEEN APPROVED BY OUR DEPARTMENT. You will receive emails with each step of the process.

recordTypes.name: New Conventional Septic System Permit
recordTypes.description: This application is for a new conventional septic system installation. DO NOT DO A PERC TEST UNTIL YOUR SITE HAS BEEN APPROVED BY OUR DEPARTMENT. You will receive emails with each step of the process. If your site is not approved for a conventional septic system an inspector will let you know.

recordTypes.name: Production Well Construction Permit Application
recordTypes.description:
Select this permit for drilling activities associated with the construction of a well used for industrial, agricultural, injection/recharge, non-potable fire suppression, or other type of production.
Construction of a new well can only be performed by a C-57 licensed driller. The California Contractors State License Board can be searched for that type of licensed driller at: https://www.cslb.ca.gov/OnlineServices/CheckLicenseII/CheckLicense.aspx

recordTypes.name: Soil Boring and Exploratory Drilling Permit Application
recordTypes.description: Select this permit for non-permanent drilling activities such as soil boring, rock coring, or other exploratory and temporary activities. Construction can only be performed by a C-57 licensed driller. The California Contractors State License Board can be searched for that type of licensed driller at: https://www.cslb.ca.gov/OnlineServices/CheckLicenseII/CheckLicense.aspx

recordTypes.name: Tank Abandonment Permit
recordTypes.description: This application is for a septic tank abandonment either by filling the tank in with an approved product or removal of the tank. Septic tanks can not be left empty in the ground as they can be a danger for collapsing.

recordTypes.name: Tank Repair/Replacement Permit
recordTypes.description: This application is for replacement septic systems or repairs to existing systems.

recordTypes.name: Temporary Event Organizer Application
recordTypes.description:
This application is for event organizers that are putting on an event more than 4 hours with more than one food vendor. APPLICATIONS ARE REQUIRED TO BE SUBMITTED 1 MONTH PRIOR TO THE EVENT. A 25% penalty will be added to organizers applications for late submission, this includes organizations with a 501C3 letter.
Please contact our department if your event is less than 4 hours and only one food vendor as it is not needed for you to fill out this application and submit it. 
Our department has a list of permitted food vendors that are available. Contact our department for that list 760-878-0238.

recordTypes.name: Temporary Food Vendor Application
recordTypes.description: This application is for a temporary food vendor to fill out. This application is due 2 weeks prior to the event. Annual permitted food vendors will only need to submit this form once in a calendar year. If the menu changes you will need to send an email to InyoEHD@inyocounty.us

recordTypes.name: Well Destruction Permit Application
recordTypes.description: Select this permit for drilling activities associated with the destruction of an existing well. Construction can only be performed by a C-57 licensed driller. The California Contractors State License Board can be searched for that type of licensed driller at: https://www.cslb.ca.gov/OnlineServices/CheckLicenseII/CheckLicense.aspx

recordTypes.name: Well Modification Permit Application
recordTypes.description: Select this permit for drilling activities associated with the modification of an existing well. Construction can only be performed by a C-57 licensed driller. The California Contractors State License Board can be searched for that type of licensed driller at: https://www.cslb.ca.gov/OnlineServices/CheckLicenseII/CheckLicense.aspx

categories.name: Building and Safety Department
categories.content: Our department is here to help when filling out these forms online. There is an in office computer that is available at our department if you would like help filling out these forms. Some attachments will be required per application. Be prepared to upload these forms to the system so that it does not hold up your application. Building Plans and Structural Documents will be required to be in digital format.

categories.name: Environmental Health Department
